SELECT tui.real_name realName,IF(tut.role_id=1,'管理员',IF(tut.role_id=2,'管理者','普通员工')) roleName, tci.province,tci.city,tci.area,tci.address,DATE_FORMAT(tll.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') lastTime,tui.avg, (SELECT tui2.real_name from t_user_info tui2,t_user_tag tut2 WHERE tut2.user_id=tui2.id AND tui2.company_id=tui.company_id AND tut2.role_id=1 LIMIT 0,1) adminName from t_user_info tui LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=tui.id LEFT JOIN t_company_info tci ON tci.id=tui.company_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from t_login_log log WHERE log.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY log.time desc LIMIT 1,1) tll ON tll.user_id=tui.id WHERE tui.id=#{userId}

SELECT COUNT(t_user.user_id) num FROM (SELECT tll.user_id FROM t_login_log tll, t_user_info tui WHERE tui.stateflag=0 AND tui.id=tll.user_id AND tui.company_id=#{companyId} AND DATE_FORMAT(tll.time,'%Y-%m-%d') like #{time} GROUP BY tll.user_id) t_user
